title: 10 Google Pixel features that you’re not using enough [Video]
content:
The Google Pixel series not only comes with day-one updates, but it also comes with a number of features that you probably haven’t been using or need to use more often.

more…

The post 10 Google Pixel features that you’re not using enough [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Not all Pixel features are created equal. Some are lesser known or underused, so here are 10 of our favorites that you might want to try.
